message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good chunk too. What do you say?
You took a big chunk last round, now it's my turn to take a bigger bite!
Let's meet in the middle. I'll lower my offer slightly, but I'm still taking the majority share.  It's better than nothing, right?
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a smaller share this time, but I'm not backing down!
We're getting closer. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to get a decent share too. Let's agree on this and end this game!
I'm not going to let you walk away with most of the cash. I'll take the majority, and you can have a small consolation prize.
Okay, Bob, I'm getting tired of this. Let's split it more evenly.  You take the majority, but I need a decent share to make this worthwhile.  This is my final offer.
